title: Esteban Degetau
text:
About Me
I am an economist working at the World Bank’s Development Research Group (Macroeconomics and Growth) as Short-Term Consultant. I hold an M.S. in Applied Economics with high honors from ITAM. Previously, I worked at the Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS), where I developed an interest in labor market transitions and social protection policy. My research draws on labor economics and applied econometrics, and I plan to begin doctoral studies in economics in 2026.
